package.name: LockscreenSuite锁屏优化-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Options to customize lockscreen dateview, time, idle timer, slide or swipe to unlock text and more, built specifically for ROOTLESS JAILBREAKS. This build is for iOS 14-16.x. Rootful builds work on iOS 7-16.x if installed using iphoneos-arm arch and not the new rootless architecture.锁屏优化，详情请看截图介绍，感谢M哥汉化支持！
